tha-ap390:0.3_0: and sovereign of the senior monks.
tha-ap390:1.4_0: a sage is skilled in immersion.
tha-ap390:3.1_0: The lie down on the same sheet
tha-ap390:3.2_0: whatever fruit he enjoyed the fruit,
tha-ap390:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap390:3.4_0: and the fruit of good and results.
tha-ap390:4.1_0: My defilements have been burnt away by practicing absorption—
tha-ap390:6.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap390:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Dhanañjāni.
tha-ap390:8.1_0: and the eighth of the senior ones.
